Description: Epiphone Limited Edition Slash Appetite For Destruction Les Paul with Slash case. This is 1 of only 3000 made world-wide. Both in very good condition. Minor signs of use and wear on both (please see photos). This was a player's guitar. Action medium low and intonation is on the money. Neck is straight. Plays, looks, and sounds as good as any Gibson Les Paul I've owned. No pickguard was issued with this model. Fast playing Slash D-profile neck and sounds killer (Seymour Duncan Slash-designed pickups are amazing). Strung recently with Ernie Ball .009 - .042. I changed out the Wilkinson tuners for Grover Deluxe Vintage tuners because Grovers are about the best tuner you can buy and they look vintage Les Paul. Case has tape covered minor tear in tolex. Listing for guitar and case only. Stand not included. Any fan of the Guns N' Roses band, Slash, or wants a great Les Paul would be proud of to own this one! Here are the specs from Epiphone: "Epiphone and Slash team up to bring you the Ltd. Edition Slash "Appetite" Les Paul Standard Outfit, inspired by the very guitar that Slash played on Guns N'Roses multi-platinum album Appetite for Destruction. The Epiphone Slash ‘Appetite’ combines all the great features found in Slash's personal Les Paul at a price that's affordable for the average working musician. In Slash's own words, "I wanted something that sounds great, lasts a long time, and is able to provide everything you need in a really good quality guitar." Limited to just 3,000 guitars worldwide. Title: Epiphone Limited Edition Slash Appetite For Destruction Les Paul w/case, Grovers
ConditionDescription: Very good condition. Minor signs of wear on guitar and case.
